subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Brandon Phillips homered and had a season-high five runs batted in to help the Reds rally from a six-run deficit in a 7-6 win over the Arizona Diamondbacks on Thursday.
snippet: Brandon Phillips homered and had a season-high five runs batted in to help the Reds rally from a six-run deficit in a 7-6 win over the Arizona Diamondbacks on Thursday.
